articles.author: Cara Tabachnick
articles.title: American tourist disappears while visiting ancient Mayan city - CBS News
articles.description: Raymond Vincent Ashcroft was last seen at Guatemala's famed cultural site on Feb. 3, authorities said.
articles.content:
An American tourist visiting the ancient Mayan city of Tikal has disappeared. 
Raymond Vincent Ashcroft was visiting the temple ruins on Feb. 3 when he suddenly vanished, Guatemalan authorities said… [+1741 chars]
